title: Quality Assurance & Automation Engineer
description: As a QA & Automation Engineer, you will ensure the highest quality standards for our software products. You will be responsible for designing and executing automated test suites, performing manual exploratory testing, and collaborating with developers to identify and resolve defects early in the development lifecycle. Key responsibilities include developing test plans, maintaining CI/CD test integration, and reporting on quality metrics. Proficiency in automation tools like Selenium, Cypress, or Jest is required. You should have a meticulous eye for detail, a strong understanding of software testing methodologies, and the ability to advocate for quality throughout the engineering organization.
